page.title: 07Milne Park
page.content: In Milne Park cars make holes on the fields by skidding and spinning.Also the swing park isn't a swing park any more because there are no swings.They have been taken down because people complain of the noise and now there is a rocket that rocks and still people complain of the noise.There is a field that hardly gets used only at weekends for football and a fair that comes up once a year but then the park is full of action with dodgems and rides,side- shows for the whole of May Bank Holiday weekend.There is horse riding and football competitions and a carnival on Monday and the whole area is lit up at night but then the fair moves on,leaving Milne Park once again quiet and deserted.
